candidate Profile Description.summary: Driven Data Science graduate with a 4.0 GPA from the University of North Texas, equipped with a proven foundation in data modeling, machine learning, and data analytics. Demonstrated proficiency in programming languages like C++, R, SQL Server, Python, and Java.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science

employment_experience.title: Paid Contract Entry Level Data Scientist
responsibilities: Designed and implemented predictive machine learning models.
Utilized web scraping tools and techniques to extract relevant data online.
technical_skills: Machine Learning & Predictive Modeling (Supervised/Unsupervised Learning, Neural Networks)

projects_summary.title: COVID-19 Data Visualization with Tableau
projects_summary.description: Created dashboards analyzing the global and national impacts of COVID-19, utilizing Tableau for data visualization.

projects_summary.title: SQL Online Bookstore Database
projects_summary.description: Designed and implemented an online bookstore database, applying SQL fundamentals to create a scalable and robust database structure.

projects_summary.title: YouTube Statistics Analysis with RapidMiner & Excel
projects_summary.description: Analyzed YouTube engagement trends for a Data Analysis course, using Excel and RapidMiner for k-means cluster analysis.

awards_and_scholarships.award: Phi Theta Kappa – Alpha Mu Tau Induction at Collin College
Magna Cum Laude – University of North Texas
